title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 285.2 - Members of board
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 285.2 - Members of board

State Regulations
(a) The chairman of the board shall always be a public representative. (b) The commissioner shall designate a
secretary for each board that is appointed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
285.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
